Continent: Australia

Mountain: Mount Kosciuszko

Description:Mount Kosciuszko is mainland Australias highest mountain, at 2,228 metres above sea level. It is located on the Main Range of the Snowy Mountains in Kosciuszko National Park, part of the Australian Alps National Parks and Reserves in New South Wales.

Path: /australia/mount-kosciuszko
